sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSTAMP(STAMPID, EMAIL, STATUS, REMARK, MOBILE) VALUES (#placeStamp.stampid#, #user.email#, 'P', #remark#, #mobile#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PSTAMP SET STATUS = 'U', USEDATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE STATUS = 'P' AND PID = #pid#
UPDATE PSTAMP SET STATUS ='C' WHERE PID = #pid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT sql_calc_found_rows IFNULL(B.stampedTotal,0) AS STAMPEDTOTAL, IFNULL(B.stampedLastDate,'2000-01-01 00:00:00') AS STAMPEDLASTDATE, A.PROFILEIMAGEURL, A.EMAIL, A.NAME, A.MOBILE FROM PUSER A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.EMAIL, COUNT(B.PID) AS stampedTotal, MAX(B.SAVEDATE) AS stampedLastDate FROM PLACESTAMP A INNER JOIN PSTAMP B ON A.STAMPID = B.STAMPID WHERE B.STATUS <> 'C' AND A.FID= #fid# GROUP BY B.EMAIL ) B ON A.EMAIL = B.EMAIL WHERE A.ISDELETE ='N' AND A.ROLE ='ROLE_USER'
AND A.NAME like CONCAT('%',#search#,'%') OR A.EMAIL like CONCAT('%',#search#,'%') OR A.MOBILE like CONCAT('%',#search#,'%')
ORDER BY $sortColumn$ $sortDirection$ LIMIT #startRow#,#endRow#

SELECT A.STAMPID, A.FID, A.STAMPTITLE, A.THEME, A.STARTDATE, A.ENDDATE , C.SID, C.STAMPCOUNT, C.EVENTDAY, C.REMARK FROM PLACESTAMP A INNER JOIN PSTAMP B ON A.STAMPID = B.STAMPID INNER JOIN PSTAMPTYPE C ON A.SID = C.SID WHERE B.EMAIL = #email# AND A.FID=#fid# GROUP BY A.STAMPID, A.FID, A.STAMPTITLE, A.THEME, A.STARTDATE, A.ENDDATE , C.SID, C.STAMPCOUNT, C.EVENTDAY, C.REMARK
